title: Gotham Knights Previews: Is it Arkham's Worthy Successor? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.05.22
description:
Blessing and Greg talk about Gotham Knights previews, Overwatch 2 servers suffering, and rumored Call of Duty leaks.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:09:33 - Housekeeping

It’s FINALLY happening: Friday the 14th, we’re moving into the Spare Bedroom

Speaking of things you do not wanna miss, we have new merch!

A new Xcast is up right now all about Halo’s dev switching to Unreal

The Roper Report  -

00:13:00 - Gotham Knights Preview Round Up
00:27:51 - Overwatch 2 servers are down following a ‘mass DDoS attack’ on launch day
00:33:16 - Ad
00:35:31 - CoD leaker claims Advanced Warfare 2 being developed by Sledgehammer Games
00:44:11 - The PlayStation Stars loyalty program is now live in North and South America
00:58:07 - Ed Boon says Mortal Kombat’s 30th anniversary is the main focus currently
01:01:15 - Kojima has tweeted once again
01:06:35 - Out today
01:06:58 - Squad Up: Alexis - PS5 - Amiantos
01:08:44 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Bless & Tim
